H0.text: Marilyn Monroe starred in the Seven Year Itch. Who directed it. Billy Wilder's contemporary, Mitchell Leisen

H1.text: Marilyn Monroe starred in the Seven Year Itch. Who directed it. George Cukor

H2.text: Marilyn Monroe starred in the Seven Year Itch. Who directed it. Joseph L. Mankiewicz

H3.text: Marilyn Monroe starred in the Seven Year Itch. Who directed it. Bill Wilder

A4.text: Wilder also directed Marilyn Monroe in The Seven Year Itch (1955).
